Presidential Medal of Freedom recipients
Ernie Banks
with an unmatched enthusiasm for
America's pastime Ernie Banks slugged

played an extraordinary 19 seasons with
the Chicago Cubs during which he was
named to 11 all-star teams hit over 500

elected to the Baseball Hall of Fame in
1977 and he will forever be known as one

during his tenure as executive editor of

and unyielding pursuit of truth continue
to set the standard for journalism
the Honorable William J Clinton

Daniel Kahneman's groundbreaking work

dr. Kahneman grew interested in

successful national security initiatives
helping to sustain American leadership
and engage nations in collaboration
after decades of confrontation he
remains a strong voice on foreign policy

Lynn has followed a bold path to become

she opened doors for women not only by

dr. Mario Molina
the curiosity and creativity that
inspired Mario Molina to convert his
family's bathroom into a laboratory as a
child have driven him through decades of
scientific research born in Mexico
dr. Molina's passion for chemistry
brought him to the United States where
his investigations of
chlorofluorocarbons led to breakthroughs
in our understanding of how they deplete
the ozone layer the impact of his

fostering international awareness as
well as earning him the 1995 Nobel Prize
in Chemistry today dr. Molina remains a
global leader continuing to study air
quality climate change and the
environment that connects us all
Tam O'Shaughnessy accepting on behalf of

thirty years ago dr. Sally K Ride soared

Stripes above Earth's atmosphere as an

no limit for those who dream of reaching

he helped more than 96% of his letterman

Gloria Steinem
a trailblazing writer and feminist

she has promoted lasting political and

Reverend Ct Vivian
equipped only with courage and an

take bold action in the face of fierce
resistance by pushing change through

Vivian established and led numerous

Patricia McGowan Wald
Patricia McGowan Wald made history as

judge Wald helped Institute standards

off screen Oprah Winfrey has used her
